description:
Has Mega Man’s nemesis Dr Wily finally changed his ways? Only time will tell, as Mega Man must deal with a new threat: eight fiendish robot masters lurking in eight new challenging stages of platform-shooter perfection!

This NES™ classic expanded upon the hit formula with two game-changing additions. Mega Man can now slide as well as run; giving him unprecedented manoeuvrability.

He also has a new sidekick, Rush the robot dog, who brings new abilities, like a jet or submarine, aiding Mega Man in his mission.
name: Mega Man™ 3
